Class ForwardMenuItem

java.lang.Object
  forward.ForwardMenuItem

public class ForwardMenuItem
extends java.lang.Object

copyright (c) 2009-2011 e-Amrita - Ing Giampietro Zedda Turin (Italy)

ForwardMenuItem

This class model a generic menu item.

Since:
21/nov/2011
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Giampietro Zedda
See Also:
ForwardPanel, ForwardCommonAreas

getGraphicObjectMenu

public javax.swing.JComponent getGraphicObjectMenu()
Get the graphic object for standard JMenu implementation

Is the JMenu, JMenuItem, JCheckBoxBoxMenuItem, , JOptionBoxMenuItem, JSeparator object, in any case
created for the menu, to support standard menuBar reference menu types.
